title: Hilton HHonors Triple Your Trip Promotion Returns Offering Members Three Times the ValueTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Hilton HHonors Triple Your Trip Promotion Returns Offering Members Three Times the Value Published on : Friday, August 21, 2015
Hilton HHonors, the loyalty program for Hilton Worldwide’s 12 distinct hotel brands, today announced the return of Triple Your Trip. A member-favorite, the promotion allows guests who book directly through Hilton to earn Double Points Monday through Thursday nights and Triple Points on Friday, Saturday and Sunday nights from September 1 – December 31, 2015 at all Hilton Hotels & Resorts, Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts, Conrad Hotels & Resorts, Canopy by Hilton, Curio – A Collection by Hilton, DoubleTree by Hilton, Embassy Suites Hotels, Hilton Garden Inn, Hampton Hotels, Homewood Suites by Hilton, Home2 Suites by Hilton and Hilton Grand Vacations properties.
“All 4,440 of our hotels are participating in the Triple Your Trip promotion – something we know means a lot to our members,” said Mark Weinstein, global head of loyalty and partnerships, Hilton Worldwide. “We’re always listening to ensure our members feel like their feedback is heard and influences important program decisions like bringing back favorite promotions, launching Digital Key and providing offerings like free Wi-Fi for those who book directly with us.”
In addition to being able to earn Bonus Points from Triple Your Trip, when guests book directly through Hilton (Hilton.com, the HHonors app, reservations call center or our corporate travel partners), they receive benefits that are not available through third-party sites, like Hilton’s Best Price Guarantee, HHonors Points, free Wi-Fi and more.
Source: Hilton HHonors
